attributes.action: create a legal right of access to the coastline - creu hawl fynediad gyfreithiol i'r arfordir
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyflwynodd Deddf CGHT hawliau mynediad i gefn gwlad agored; mae angen deddf i roi hawliau cyffelyn i gerdded/rhedeg, marchogaeth a seiclo ar hyd yr arfordir.  Gweler gwefan Cymdeithas y Cerddwyr am fanylion eu hymgyrch nhw (sy'n annibynol ar y ddeiseb hon)

The CRoW Act granted access rights to open country; an act is needed to grant similar rights of access to the coast for pedestrians, horseriders and cyclists.  Please see the Ranblers' Association's website for details of their campaign (which is not conected to this petition)
